title: An approued treatise of hawkes and hawking Diuided into three bookes. The first teacheth, how to make a short-winged hawke good, with good conditions. The second, how to reclaime a hawke from any ill condition. The third, teacheth cures for all knowne griefes and diseases. By Edmund Bert, Gentleman.
author: Bert, Edmund.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Richard Moore, and are to be sold at his shop in S. Dunstans Church-yard,
